description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for Irregular Operations Exercise Support.  The services must be provided on an as and when requested basis upon receipt of a Task Authorization provided by the Department of National Defence. The period of the contract is from April 1st 2023 to March 31st 2024 inclusive with irrevocable options to extend it for up to two additional one-year periods. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Supply Arrangement W6399-21J415 Category 6 Holders have been emailed the Request for Proposal.  Other interested bidders may submit bids once they have qualified for the Supply Arrangement.  Canada will not extend the RFP to provide additional time for bidders to qualify for the Supply Arrangement and submit a proposal for the RFP

full_summary:
**Irrégular Operations Exercise Support Tender**
================================================----

**Announcement Information**
---------------------------

*   **Solicitation Reference**: WS3889776983-Doc3889777039
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-03-02
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-20T14:00:00 (expired)
*   **Amendment Date**: 2023-03-16

**Project Overview**
----------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting interested contractors to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Irregular Operations Exercise Support. The Contract will be awarded through a competitive, selective tendering process.

**Contract Period**
-----------------

The initial contract period is 12 months, commencing on April 1st, 2023, with irrevocable options to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The selected contractor will be required to provide Exercise Support Services on an ad-hoc, as-and-when-requested basis. Task Authorizations will be issued by DND to initiate specific tasks and activities.

**Eligibility**
--------------

Suppliers must be pre-qualified for Category 6 of the Supply Arrangement W6399-21J415. If interested, contractors may submit a Request for Qualification (RFQ) and later, a Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**
------------------------------

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted by the qualified subcontractors.

**Notice of Expire**
-------------------

The Tender Closing Date, 2023-03-20T14:00:00, has passed. The Contracting Authority recommends that interested suppliers contact the Contracting Authority to discuss further.

**Contracting Authority Information**
----------------------------------

*   **Contracting Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User**: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **Point of Contact**: Sean Webster (webster.sean@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) (Please contact via email)

**Language and Commodity Codes**
------------------------------

*   **UNSPAC Codes**:
    *   86131800: Military Education
    *   86132100: Training Planning, Facilitation, and Delivery Services
*   **Trade Agreements**: Applicable Trade Agreements include Canada-Chile, Canada-Colombia, Canadian, Canada-Panama, Canada
